FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of flowspec routes or rules that can be embedded into an ingress IP filter policy for a specified routing instance. Flowspec filter entries embedded in a filter policy in this routing instance will use filter entries from the range between the embedding offset and "offset + ip-filter-max-size - 1".

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of flowspec routes or rules that can be embedded into an ingress IP filter policy. Values-0 to 262143.
